constantValues: Relationship between an account or contact and an opportunity.

definitions.description: Relationship between an account or contact and an opportunity.

members.name: customerOpportunityRoleId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the opportunity relationship.

members.description: Unique identifier of the opportunity relationship.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Account and Contact' adds the 'customerId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityRelationship' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: customerId

constantValues: Select the account or contact associated to the opportunity, such as a strategic partner, third-party vendor, or key decision maker.

value.description: Select the account or contact associated to the opportunity, such as a strategic partner, third-party vendor, or key decision maker.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the opportunity relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the opportunity relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Opportunity' adds the 'opportunityId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityRelationship' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: opportunityId

constantValues: Choose the opportunity that the specified account or contact is related to. The opportunity relationship will be displayed in the Relationships view on the selected opportunity.

value.description: Choose the opportunity that the specified account or contact is related to. The opportunity relationship will be displayed in the Relationships view on the selected opportunity.

members.name: opportunityRoleId

constantValues: Choose the role or nature of the relationship that the customer has with the opportunity. The field is read-only until a customer has been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.description: Choose the role or nature of the relationship that the customer has with the opportunity. The field is read-only until a customer has been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

members.name: opportunityStatusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the opportunity.

members.description: Reason for the status of the opportunity.
